New Records: South Africa achieved the highest total chase in T20Is in Abu Dhabi with 174/2
Key Match Events: South Africa won the game by 8 wickets with more than two overs to spare
Ryan Rickelton won the Player of the Match award for his stunning knock of 76 runs
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Aiden Markram won the toss and opted to bowl first
Ireland captain Paul Stirling revealed that the players underwent sauna sessions to adjust to the heat
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa were delighted with this victory, taking a 1-0 lead in the series
Ireland will try to make amends in the final encounter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Sheikh Zayed Stadium in Abu Dhabi
The series is a two-match T20I followed by three ODIs
